short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy local and session storage between domains

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Storage Copier - Effortlessly Transfer Your Browser Data

Storage Copier is a powerful Chrome extension designed to simplify the process of transferring your browser's local and session storage data. With this tool, developers and power users can easily copy storage data from one domain to another, streamlining testing and development processes.

Key Features:
• One-Click Copy: Instantly copy all storage data from the current domain
• Selective Pasting: Choose to paste either local storage, session storage, or both
• Cross-Domain Transfer: Easily move data between different domains
• Developer-Friendly: Perfect for testing web applications across different environments
• User-Friendly Interface: Simple popup interface for quick actions

Whether you're a web developer testing your application, a QA engineer verifying functionality across domains, or a power user managing multiple accounts, Storage Copier streamlines your workflow and helps you manage browser storage data with ease.

Install Storage Copier today and simplify your browser data management!
